dict.acceptation: 河流，小河，川，溪；潮流，趋势，倾向；（事件等的）连续，（财富等的）滚滚而来；流出，流注，一连串；
飘扬；招展；鱼贯而行；一个接一个地移动；
按能力分班（或分组）；按能力分班（或分组）；

sent.orig: Turn the nozzle until the word'sTREAM" is upper most for straight and long distance spraying.
sent.trans: 用于狭窄尖长的地方，请将喷嘴调校至印有“STREAM”字样的一方向上。

sent.orig: If a stream is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream.
sent.trans: 如果流是可写的，则在流的末尾写入将使该流扩展。

sent.orig: The trickle become a stream; the stream has now become a torrent.
sent.trans: 涓涓细流汇成了小溪，小溪现在已变成了奔腾的江河。

sent.orig: There are 4 essential streams all throughout E-commerce, namely information stream streamstream and logistic stream.
sent.trans: 电子商务过程包含着四种基本的“流”，即信息流、商流、资金流和物流。

sent.orig: Number of times the stream has paused due to insufficient stream buffers.
sent.trans: 由于流缓冲区不足导致流程暂停的次数。
